version_description:
Thank you for being with us! We made some changes in the new version:

- Stability and performance improvements
- Minor issues fixed
- Fix keywords
- Support on iPad 

We would appreciate if you take a moment to review our app on the App Store!

Thank you for being with us! We made some changes in the new version:

- Stability and performance improvements
- Minor issues fixed
- Add in-app purchase
- Changed logo

If you enjoy these Screen Recorder, please give us a 5-star rating on the App Store. Thank you :)

We hope you are enjoying this screen recorder, we cleared some bugs that caused the recordings not to save.
You can now Live Stream your screen to Twitch, Youtube, Facebook and other social media platforms! Enjoy this screen recorder."
Reaction cam was added to record your face.
Improved user interface for screen recording and live streaming, solved bugs with face cam recording.
